item.title: The Euler Project
item.description: This blog is written for describing my solutions and how I approached each problem for the Euler Project. The links of the original problems I chose to challenge myself are included below. Feel free to try them and share your thinkings while reading this blog! Problem 7: 10001st Prime This problem was successfully solved by 424,660 participants. Here is my idea for this question. It can be answered by completing two separate tasks.
